channel.title: Unability to log in after a while
channel.description:
on my server players get on simple its ran on a 3GB VPS hosted computer (vpsland $68 a month)
well after a while, players arn't able to get on so i have to restart the server
i don't like using an auto restarter since sometimes it doesn't restart it correctly, it will close it, but won't open a new 1 (sometimes) and its down til it trys to restart again
so im asking, WAT CAUSES THIS?!
rep++ 2 helpz

item.title: Unability to log in after a while
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

This seems very basic but could the VPS Comp be going to sleep?

Read full topic
